EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CloudFoundryPlatform_Q313.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us at Platform: The Cloud Foundry Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join IBM, GE, Pivotal and other Cloud Foundry Community Members at Platform: The Cloud Foundry Conference <http://www.platformcf.com> Meet core contributors and fellow users in Santa Clara, CA on Sept 8-9th to learn and share: • Cloud Foundry case studies
• Technical architecture and implementation details
• Engineering roadmap
• Operational best practices Do you have something you would like to present? Please submit <http://www.platformcf.com/submit> your proposal - we need to finalize the program soon. We hope to see you at Platform. Register Today <http://www.platformcf.eventbrite.com/> using promo code “cfcom” and receive 50% off (first 100 registrations). REGISTER NOW! <http://www.platformcf.eventbrite.com/>
Join the conversation <http://blog.cloudfoundry.com/2013/08/01/facilitating-open-community-an-interview-with-andrew-clay-shafer/> on continuous delivery, cloud and Agile with host Andrew Shafer <https://twitter.com/littleidea>.
